title: Bloomberg Markets: Uber’s Michael Leaves Amid Sweeping Changes
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Uber’s Michael Leaves Amid Sweeping Changes
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Eric Newcomer Startups Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Uber Technologies ousting Emil Michael, the company’s head of business and founder Travis Kalanick’s closest confidant, stemming from an investigation into workplace harassment and culture that was presented to directors on Sunday.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
